00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief OCS audio implementation with WISHBONE master and slave interface.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief ocs_audio.v
00030 
00031 List of audio registers:
00032 \verbatim
00033 Implemented:
00034     AUD0LCH   +  0A0  W   A( E )  Audio channel 0 location (high 3 bits, 5 if ECS)
00035     AUD0LCL   +  0A2  W   A       Audio channel 0 location (low 15 bits) (horiz. position)
00036     AUD0LEN      0A4  W   P       Audio channel 0 length
00037     AUD0PER      0A6  W   P( E )  Audio channel 0 period
00038     AUD0VOL      0A8  W   P       Audio channel 0 volume
00039     AUD0DAT   &  0AA  W   P       Audio channel 0 data
00040     
00041     AUD1LCH   +  0B0  W   A       Audio channel 1 location (high 3 bits)
00042     AUD1LCL   +  0B2  W   A       Audio channel 1 location (low 15 bits)
00043     AUD1LEN      0B4  W   P       Audio channel 1 length
00044     AUD1PER      0B6  W   P       Audio channel 1 period
00045     AUD1VOL      0B8  W   P       Audio channel 1 volume
00046     AUD1DAT   &  0BA  W   P       Audio channel 1 data
00047     
00048     AUD2LCH   +  0C0  W   A       Audio channel 2 location (high 3 bits)
00049     AUD2LCL   +  0C2  W   A       Audio channel 2 location (low 15 bits)
00050     AUD2LEN      0C4  W   P       Audio channel 2 length
00051     AUD2PER      0C6  W   P       Audio channel 2 period
00052     AUD2VOL      0C8  W   P       Audio channel 2 volume
00053     AUD2DAT   &  0CA  W   P       Audio channel 2 data
00054     
00055     AUD3LCH   +  0D0  W   A       Audio channel 3 location (high 3 bits)
00056     AUD3LCL   +  0D2  W   A       Audio channel 3 location (low 15 bits)
00057     AUD3LEN      0D4  W   P       Audio channel 3 length
00058     AUD3PER      0D6  W   P       Audio channel 3 period
00059     AUD3VOL      0D8  W   P       Audio channel 3 volume
00060     AUD3DAT   &  0DA  W   P       Audio channel 3 data
00061 \endverbatim
00062 */
00063 module ocs_audio(
00064     //% \name Clock and reset

00065     //% @{
00066     input           CLK_I,
00067     input           reset_n,
00068     //% @}
00069     
00070     //% \name WISHBONE master

00071     //% @{
00072     output reg      CYC_O,
00073     output reg      STB_O,
00074     output          WE_O,
00075     output [31:2]   ADR_O,
00076     output [3:0]    SEL_O,
00077     input [31:0]    master_DAT_I,
00078     input           ACK_I,
00079     //% @}
00080     
00081     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00082     //% @{
00083     input           CYC_I,
00084     input           STB_I,
00085     input           WE_I,
00086     input [8:2]     ADR_I,
00087     input [3:0]     SEL_I,
00088     input [31:0]    slave_DAT_I,
00089     output reg      ACK_O,
00090     //% @}
00091     
00092     //% \name Internal OCS ports

00093     //% @{
00094     input           pulse_color,
00095     input           line_start,
00096     
00097     input [10:0]    dma_con,
00098     input [14:0]    adk_con,
00099     
00100     output [3:0]    audio_irq,
00101     //% @}
00102     
00103     //% \name drv_audio interface

00104     //% @{
00105     output [5:0] volume0,
00106     output [5:0] volume1,
00107     output [5:0] volume2,
00108     output [5:0] volume3,
00109     output [7:0] sample0,
00110     output [7:0] sample1,
00111     output [7:0] sample2,
00112     output [7:0] sample3
00113     //% @}
00114 );
00115 
00116 assign WE_O = 1'b0;
00117 assign SEL_O = 4'b1111;
00118 
00119 assign volume0 = (adk_con[0] == 1'b1 || adk_con[4] == 1'b1) ? 6'd0 : (channel0_volume[6] == 1'b1) ? 6'b111111 : channel0_volume[5:0];
00120 assign volume1 = (adk_con[1] == 1'b1 || adk_con[5] == 1'b1) ? 6'd0 : (channel1_volume[6] == 1'b1) ? 6'b111111 : channel1_volume[5:0];
00121 assign volume2 = (adk_con[2] == 1'b1 || adk_con[6] == 1'b1) ? 6'd0 : (channel2_volume[6] == 1'b1) ? 6'b111111 : channel2_volume[5:0];
00122 assign volume3 = (adk_con[3] == 1'b1 || adk_con[7] == 1'b1) ? 6'd0 : (channel3_volume[6] == 1'b1) ? 6'b111111 : channel3_volume[5:0];
00123 
00124 wire [3:0] dma_reqs;
00125 wire [1:0] selected_channel;
00126 assign selected_channel = 
00127     (dma_reqs[0] == 1'b1) ? 2'd0 :
00128     (dma_reqs[1] == 1'b1) ? 2'd1 :
00129     (dma_reqs[2] == 1'b1) ? 2'd2 :
00130     2'd3;
00131 
00132 assign ADR_O =
00133     (selected_channel == 3'd0) ? dma_address0[31:2] :
00134     (selected_channel == 3'd1) ? dma_address1[31:2] :
00135     (selected_channel == 3'd2) ? dma_address2[31:2] :
00136     dma_address3[31:2];
00137 
00138 wire dma_req;
00139 assign dma_req = dma_reqs[0] | dma_reqs[1] | dma_reqs[2] | dma_reqs[3];
00140 
00141 //*************** Channel 0
00142 wire [6:0] channel0_volume;
00143 wire [15:0] channel0_data;
00144 wire [1:0] channel0_update;
00145 wire [31:0] dma_address0;
00146 
00147 wire write_ena_extern0;
00148 assign write_ena_extern0 = (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 &&
00149     (  { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0A0 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0A4 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0A8 ) );
00150 wire write_ena0;
00151 assign write_ena0 = write_ena_extern0;
00152 
00153 wire [1:0] write_address0;
00154 assign write_address0 =
00155     ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0A0) ? 2'd0 :
00156     ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0A4) ? 2'd1 :
00157     2'd2;
00158 
00159 wire [31:0] write_data0;
00160 assign write_data0 = slave_DAT_I;
00161 
00162 wire [3:0] write_sel0;
00163 assign write_sel0 = SEL_I;
00164 
00165 sound_channel sound_channel_0(
00166     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00167     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00168     
00169     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00170     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00171     
00172     .ocs_audio(dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[0] == 1'b1),
00173     .ocs_audio(dma_reqs[0]),
00174     .ocs_audio(dma_address0),
00175     .ocs_audio(selected_channel == 2'd0 && ACK_I == 1'b1),
00176     .ocs_audio(master_DAT_I),
00177     
00178     .ocs_audio(write_ena0),
00179     .ocs_audio(write_address0),
00180     .ocs_audio(write_data0),
00181     .ocs_audio(write_sel0),
00182     
00183     .ocs_audio(audio_irq[0]),
00184     
00185     .ocs_audio(channel0_volume),
00186     .ocs_audio(sample0),
00187     .ocs_audio(adk_con[0] == 1'b1 || adk_con[4] == 1'b1),
00188     .ocs_audio(channel0_data),
00189     .ocs_audio(channel0_update)
00190 );
00191 
00192 
00193 //*************** Channel 1
00194 wire [6:0] channel1_volume;
00195 wire [15:0] channel1_data;
00196 wire [1:0] channel1_update;
00197 wire [31:0] dma_address1;
00198 
00199 wire write_ena_extern1;
00200 assign write_ena_extern1 = (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 &&
00201     (  { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0B0 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0B4 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0B8) );
00202 wire write_ena1;
00203 assign write_ena1 = ((adk_con[0] == 1'b1 || adk_con[4] == 1'b1) && (channel0_update == 2'b10 || channel0_update == 2'b11)) || write_ena_extern1;
00204 
00205 wire [1:0] write_address1;
00206 assign write_address1 = 
00207     write_ena_extern1 ? (
00208         ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0B0) ? 2'd0 :
00209         ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0B4) ? 2'd1 :
00210         2'd2
00211     ) :
00212     (adk_con[0] == 1'b1 && adk_con[4] == 1'b0) ? 2'd2 :
00213     (adk_con[0] == 1'b0 && adk_con[4] == 1'b1) ? 2'd1 :
00214     (channel0_update == 2'b10) ? 2'd2 :
00215     2'd1;
00216     
00217 wire [3:0] write_sel1;
00218 assign write_sel1 =
00219     write_ena_extern1 ? SEL_I :
00220     (adk_con[0] == 1'b1 && adk_con[4] == 1'b0) ? 4'b1100 :
00221     (adk_con[0] == 1'b0 && adk_con[4] == 1'b1) ? 4'b0011 :
00222     (channel0_update == 2'b10) ? 4'b1100 :
00223     4'b0011;
00224 
00225 wire [31:0] write_data1;
00226 assign write_data1 = 
00227     write_ena_extern1 ? slave_DAT_I :
00228     channel0_data;
00229 
00230 sound_channel sound_channel_1(
00231     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00232     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00233     
00234     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00235     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00236     
00237     .ocs_audio(dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[1] == 1'b1),
00238     .ocs_audio(dma_reqs[1]),
00239     .ocs_audio(dma_address1),
00240     .ocs_audio(selected_channel == 2'd1 && ACK_I == 1'b1),
00241     .ocs_audio(master_DAT_I),
00242     
00243     .ocs_audio(write_ena1),
00244     .ocs_audio(write_address1),
00245     .ocs_audio(write_data1),
00246     .ocs_audio(write_sel1),
00247     
00248     .ocs_audio(audio_irq[1]),
00249     
00250     .ocs_audio(channel1_volume),
00251     .ocs_audio(sample1),
00252     .ocs_audio(adk_con[1] == 1'b1 || adk_con[5] == 1'b1),
00253     .ocs_audio(channel1_data),
00254     .ocs_audio(channel1_update)
00255 );
00256 
00257 //*************** Channel 2
00258 wire [6:0] channel2_volume;
00259 wire [15:0] channel2_data;
00260 wire [1:0] channel2_update;
00261 wire [31:0] dma_address2;
00262 wire [7:0] channel2_sample;
00263 
00264 wire write_ena_extern2;
00265 assign write_ena_extern2 = (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 &&
00266     (  { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0C0 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0C4 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0C8) );
00267 wire write_ena2;
00268 assign write_ena2 = ((adk_con[1] == 1'b1 || adk_con[5] == 1'b1) && (channel1_update == 2'b10 || channel1_update == 2'b11)) || write_ena_extern2;
00269 
00270 wire [1:0] write_address2;
00271 assign write_address2 = 
00272     write_ena_extern2 ? (
00273         ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0C0) ? 2'd0 :
00274         ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0C4) ? 2'd1 :
00275         2'd2
00276     ) :
00277     (adk_con[1] == 1'b1 && adk_con[5] == 1'b0) ? 2'd2 :
00278     (adk_con[1] == 1'b0 && adk_con[5] == 1'b1) ? 2'd1 :
00279     (channel1_update == 2'b10) ? 2'd2 :
00280     2'd1;
00281     
00282 wire [3:0] write_sel2;
00283 assign write_sel2 =
00284     write_ena_extern2 ? SEL_I :
00285     (adk_con[1] == 1'b1 && adk_con[5] == 1'b0) ? 4'b1100 :
00286     (adk_con[1] == 1'b0 && adk_con[5] == 1'b1) ? 4'b0011 :
00287     (channel1_update == 2'b10) ? 4'b1100 :
00288     4'b0011;
00289 
00290 wire [31:0] write_data2;
00291 assign write_data2 = 
00292     write_ena_extern2 ? slave_DAT_I :
00293     channel1_data;
00294 
00295 sound_channel sound_channel_2(
00296     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00297     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00298     
00299     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00300     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00301     
00302     .ocs_audio(dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[2] == 1'b1),
00303     .ocs_audio(dma_reqs[2]),
00304     .ocs_audio(dma_address2),
00305     .ocs_audio(selected_channel == 2'd2 && ACK_I == 1'b1),
00306     .ocs_audio(master_DAT_I),
00307     
00308     .ocs_audio(write_ena2),
00309     .ocs_audio(write_address2),
00310     .ocs_audio(write_data2),
00311     .ocs_audio(write_sel2),
00312     
00313     .ocs_audio(audio_irq[2]),
00314     
00315     .ocs_audio(channel2_volume),
00316     .ocs_audio(sample2),
00317     .ocs_audio(adk_con[2] == 1'b1 || adk_con[6] == 1'b1),
00318     .ocs_audio(channel2_data),
00319     .ocs_audio(channel2_update)
00320 );
00321 
00322 //****************** Channel 3
00323 wire [6:0] channel3_volume;
00324 wire [15:0] channel3_data;
00325 wire [1:0] channel3_update;
00326 wire [31:0] dma_address3;
00327 
00328 wire write_ena_extern3;
00329 assign write_ena_extern3 = (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1 &&
00330     ( { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0D0 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0D4 || { ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0D8) );
00331 wire write_ena3;
00332 assign write_ena3 = ((adk_con[2] == 1'b1 || adk_con[6] == 1'b1) && (channel2_update == 2'b10 || channel2_update == 2'b11)) || write_ena_extern3;
00333 
00334 wire [1:0] write_address3;
00335 assign write_address3 = 
00336     write_ena_extern3 ? (
00337         ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0D0) ? 2'd0 :
00338         ({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h0D4) ? 2'd1 :
00339         2'd2
00340     ) :
00341     (adk_con[2] == 1'b1 && adk_con[6] == 1'b0) ? 2'd2 :
00342     (adk_con[2] == 1'b0 && adk_con[6] == 1'b1) ? 2'd1 :
00343     (channel2_update == 2'b10) ? 2'd2 :
00344     2'd1;
00345     
00346 wire [3:0] write_sel3;
00347 assign write_sel3 =
00348     write_ena_extern3 ? SEL_I :
00349     (adk_con[2] == 1'b1 && adk_con[6] == 1'b0) ? 4'b1100 :
00350     (adk_con[2] == 1'b0 && adk_con[6] == 1'b1) ? 4'b0011 :
00351     (channel2_update == 2'b10) ? 4'b1100 :
00352     4'b0011;
00353 
00354 wire [31:0] write_data3;
00355 assign write_data3 = 
00356     write_ena_extern3 ? slave_DAT_I :
00357     channel2_data;
00358 
00359 sound_channel sound_channel_3(
00360     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00361     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00362     
00363     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00364     .ocs_audio(ocs_audio),
00365     
00366     .ocs_audio(dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[3] == 1'b1),
00367     .ocs_audio(dma_reqs[3]),
00368     .ocs_audio(dma_address3),
00369     .ocs_audio(selected_channel == 2'd3 && ACK_I == 1'b1),
00370     .ocs_audio(master_DAT_I),
00371     
00372     .ocs_audio(write_ena3),
00373     .ocs_audio(write_address3),
00374     .ocs_audio(write_data3),
00375     .ocs_audio(write_sel3),
00376     
00377     .ocs_audio(audio_irq[3]),
00378     
00379     .ocs_audio(channel3_volume),
00380     .ocs_audio(sample3),
00381     .ocs_audio(adk_con[3] == 1'b1 || adk_con[7] == 1'b1),
00382     .ocs_audio(channel3_data),
00383     .ocs_audio(channel3_update)
00384 );
00385 
00386 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00387     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00388         CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00389         STB_O <= 1'b0;
00390         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00391     end
00392     else begin
00393         if(ACK_O == 1'b1) begin
00394             ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00395         end
00396         else if(write_ena_extern0 == 1'b1 || write_ena_extern1 == 1'b1 || write_ena_extern2 == 1'b1 || write_ena_extern3 == 1'b1 ||
00397             (CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0))
00398         begin
00399             ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00400         end
00401         
00402         if(CYC_O == 1'b0 && STB_O == 1'b0 && dma_req == 1'b1) begin
00403             CYC_O <= 1'b1;
00404             STB_O <= 1'b1;
00405         end
00406         else if(CYC_O == 1'b1 && STB_O == 1'b1 && ACK_I == 1'b1) begin
00407             CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00408             STB_O <= 1'b0;
00409         end
00410          
00411     end
00412 end
00413 
00414 endmodule
00415 
00416 /*! \brief Single audio channel.
00417  */
00418 module sound_channel(
00419     input               CLK_I,
00420     input               reset_n,
00421     
00422     // color pulse
00423     input               pulse_color,
00424     input               line_start,
00425     
00426     input               dma_ena,
00427     output reg          dma_req,
00428     output reg [31:0]   dma_address,
00429     input               dma_done,
00430     input [31:0]        dma_data,
00431     
00432     input               write_ena,
00433     // 0:   AUDxLCH,    AUDxLCL,
00434     // 1:   AUDxLEN,    AUDxPER,
00435     // 2:   AUDxVOL,    AUDxDAT,
00436     input [1:0]         write_address,
00437     input [31:0]        write_data,
00438     input [3:0]         write_sel,
00439     
00440     output reg          irq,
00441     
00442     // sound interface
00443     // 0-63,64 only
00444     output reg [6:0]    volume,
00445     output reg [7:0]    sample,
00446     input               is_modulator_channel,
00447     // volume[6:0]:  modulation
00448     // period[15:0]: modulation
00449     output reg [15:0]   data,
00450     // 2'b01: 8 bit sample update only
00451     // 2'b10: 8 bit sample and even word update
00452     // 2'b11: 8 bit sample and odd word update
00453     output reg [1:0]    data_update
00454 );
00455 
00456 reg [31:0] location;
00457 reg [15:0] length;
00458 reg [16:0] length_left;
00459 reg [15:0] period;
00460 reg [15:0] period_left;
00461 reg even_word;
00462 reg [15:0] data2;
00463 reg [1:0] avail;
00464 reg [1:0] state;
00465 
00466 parameter [1:0]
00467     S_IDLE      = 2'd0,
00468     S_DIRECT    = 2'd1,
00469     S_DMA       = 2'd2;
00470 
00471 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00472     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00473         dma_req <= 1'b0;
00474         dma_address <= 32'd0;
00475         irq <= 1'b0;
00476         volume <= 7'd0;
00477         sample <= 8'd0;
00478         data <= 16'd0;
00479         data_update <= 2'b00;
00480         
00481         location <= 32'd0;
00482         length <= 16'd0;
00483         length_left <= 17'd0;
00484         period <= 16'd0;
00485         period_left <= 16'd0;
00486         even_word <= 1'b0;
00487         data2 <= 16'd0;
00488         avail <= 2'd0;
00489         state <= S_IDLE;
00490     end
00491     else begin
00492         
00493         if(irq == 1'b1)             irq <= 1'b0;
00494         if(data_update != 2'b00)    data_update <= 2'b00;
00495         
00496         if(state == S_IDLE && dma_ena == 1'b0 && write_ena == 1'b1 && write_address == 2'd2 && write_sel[1:0] != 2'b00) begin
00497             state <= S_DIRECT;
00498             length_left <= 17'd2;
00499             period_left <= period;
00500             even_word <= 1'b0;
00501             avail <= 2'd0;
00502         end
00503         else if((state == S_DIRECT && dma_ena == 1'b1) || (state == S_DMA && dma_ena == 1'b0)) begin
00504             state <= S_IDLE;
00505         end
00506         else if(state == S_IDLE && dma_ena == 1'b1 && line_start == 1'b1 && length > 17'd0) begin
00507             state <= S_DMA;
00508             dma_address <= location;
00509             length_left <= { length, 1'b0 };
00510             period_left <= period;
00511             irq <= 1'b1;
00512             even_word <= 1'b0;
00513             avail <= 2'd0;
00514             
00515             dma_req <= 1'b1;
00516         end
00517         else if(state == S_DMA && line_start == 1'b1 && avail < 2'd2) begin
00518             dma_req <= 1'b1;
00519         end
00520         else if(state == S_DMA && dma_done == 1'b1) begin
00521             dma_req <= 1'b0;
00522             avail <= avail + 2'd1;
00523             dma_address <= dma_address + 32'd2;
00524         end
00525         
00526         if((state == S_DIRECT || state == S_DMA) && pulse_color == 1'b1) begin
00527             if(period_left > 16'd1) begin
00528                 period_left <= period_left - 16'd1;
00529             end
00530             else begin
00531                 period_left <= period;
00532                 
00533                 if(is_modulator_channel == 1'b0)    data_update <= 2'b01;
00534                 else if(even_word == 1'b0)          data_update <= 2'b10;
00535                 else                                data_update <= 2'b11;
00536                 
00537                 if(is_modulator_channel == 1'b1)    even_word <= ~even_word;
00538                 
00539                 if(length_left[0] == 1'b0)          sample <= data[15:8];
00540                 else                                sample <= data[7:0];
00541                 
00542                 if(avail > 2'd0 && (is_modulator_channel == 1'b1 || length_left[0] == 1'b1)) begin
00543                     if(avail == 2'd2) data <= data2;
00544                     avail <= avail - 2'd1;
00545                 end
00546                 
00547                 if((is_modulator_channel == 1'b1 && length_left <= 17'd2) || length_left <= 17'd1) begin
00548                     length_left <= 17'd0;
00549                     state <= S_IDLE;
00550                     if(state == S_DIRECT) irq <= 1'b1;
00551                 end
00552                 else if(is_modulator_channel == 1'b1)   length_left <= length_left - 17'd2;
00553                 else                                    length_left <= length_left - 17'd1;
00554             end
00555         end
00556         
00557         if(write_ena == 1'b1) begin
00558             if(write_address == 2'd0 && write_sel[0] == 1'b1) location[7:0] <= write_data[7:0];
00559             if(write_address == 2'd0 && write_sel[1] == 1'b1) location[15:8] <= write_data[15:8];
00560             if(write_address == 2'd0 && write_sel[2] == 1'b1) location[23:16] <= write_data[23:16];
00561             if(write_address == 2'd0 && write_sel[3] == 1'b1) location[31:24] <= write_data[31:24];
00562             if(write_address == 2'd1 && write_sel[0] == 1'b1) period[7:0] <= write_data[7:0];
00563             if(write_address == 2'd1 && write_sel[1] == 1'b1) period[15:8] <= write_data[15:8];
00564             if(write_address == 2'd1 && write_sel[2] == 1'b1) length[7:0] <= write_data[23:16];
00565             if(write_address == 2'd1 && write_sel[3] == 1'b1) length[15:8] <= write_data[31:24];
00566             if(write_address == 2'd2 && write_sel[0] == 1'b1) data[7:0] <= write_data[7:0];
00567             if(write_address == 2'd2 && write_sel[1] == 1'b1) data[15:8] <= write_data[15:8];
00568             if(write_address == 2'd2 && write_sel[2] == 1'b1) volume[6:0] <= write_data[22:16];
00569             if(write_address == 2'd2 && write_sel[3] == 1'b1) ;
00570         end
00571         else if(dma_done == 1'b1) begin
00572             if(avail == 2'd0) begin
00573                 if(dma_address[1] == 1'b0)  data <= dma_data[31:16];
00574                 else                        data <= dma_data[15:0];
00575             end
00576             else begin
00577                 if(dma_address[1] == 1'b0)  data2 <= dma_data[31:16];
00578                 else                        data2 <= dma_data[15:0];
00579             end
00580         end
00581         
00582     end
00583 end
00584 
00585 
00586 endmodule
